item.title: Batch processing summary
item.description: Batch processing is a crucial technique in training neural network (NN) models. Instead of processing individual data samples one at a time, batch processing groups multiple samples into batches and processes them simultaneously.

item.title: Special token injection attacks
item.description: A special token is one designed to only be relevant to the model - such as <|end_of_text|>. These can cause standard software engineering bugs if handled poorly in the code.
